snippet: Thirteen artifacts from the Sacred Convent of St. Francis in Assisi underwent meticulous last-minute restoration before beginning their journey on Monday.
abstract: Thirteen artifacts from the Sacred Convent of St Francis in Assisi undergo meticulous last-minute restoration before beginning their journey to United States; it is their first trip out of Italy in 700 years.
lead_paragraph: Thirteen artifacts from the Sacred Convent of St. Francis in Assisi underwent meticulous last-minute restoration before beginning their journey on Monday.

headline.main: St. Francis Manuscripts Headed to U.S., in First Trip Out of Italy in 700 Years
headline.print_headline: St. Francis Manuscripts Headed to U.S., in First Trip Out of Italy in 700 Years
